name: Cooper Pooper
description:
Cooper Pooper!
Cooper lost his axe and is up against an endless wave of enemies with nothing but his powerful ass to combat them!  Good thing the shop is open 24/7!

How to play!

Step 1 - Collect Coins!

Step 2 - Poop on Enemies! (or you can jump on them)

Step 3 - Visit the shop to buy more beer or food! Beer restores health and food refills your bowels so you can poop more! (they cost 5 gold pieces each)

Step 4 - Survive! Can you beat your personal high score?  Anyone get to 1000+?
